name: Among Them (GelaPT, PappaSmurff, forgettablename20, despairkuro)
description:
"This game focuses around a future where Androids may be so similar to humans that we no longer know how to distinguish the real from the artificial, since they may be programmed to act like us, both socially and emotionally"

Sinopsis

With technological advances, society began to develop Androids, and forced these to work for them. After a group of Androids became aware of their reality, revolutions arose on their part against humans. Androids were then considered dangerous, and a group of detectives responsible for identifying them among the population was created.

--------------------------------------------------------

Detective objective 

Capture all hidden Androids among NPCs and prevent them from killing all VIPs before the time ends.

Androids Objective 

Kill all VIPs before time runs out without being caught by the detective. Doing this you can escape!

--------------------------------------------------------

Controls

(This game only supports Gamepads such as Xbox and PlayStation ones)

[X/■] - Attack
[Y/▲] - Start the Game
[A/●] - Interact with the UI
[B/✖] - Go Back

--------------------------------------------------------

Multiplayer

Right now the game itself does not support online Multiplayer but don't lose your hope! We recommend the use of Parsec!
